name: Argon Assault (anurajbh)
description:
Welcome to Argon Assault, a 3D On Rails Shooter created in Unity. This project was created for the Udemy Course "The Complete C# Unity Developer 3D" (Ben Tristem and Rick Davidson, Gamedev.tv).

The player pilots a spaceship through a mine located on an asteroid. The asterioid is currently being raided by pirates, and the player can gain points by shooting at the pirates. 

Controls(can be modified, however, the onscreen UI will not display the modified controls)

W- Up

A- Left

D- Right

S- Down

Space- Shoot

Enter/Return- Start

Esc- Exit
